text:
e="preserve">Rubén Anguiano (17 November 1955 – 28 September 2020) was a Mexican footballer. He played as a midfielder. Anguiano played for Zacatepec, Leones Negros and Atlante. He was born in Mexico City.
He earned 8 caps for the Mexican national team between 1974 and 1977.
Anguiano died on 28 September 2020 aged 64, from COVID-19 in Mexico City, aged 64.
